column1: Art Institute of Chicago////A really spectacular place.  One of those places that everyone tells tourists to go when they're coming through Chicago
column2: and it actually ends up living up to the hype.  Honestly
column3: there is so much history and cool stuff in here that you could get lost in here for hours upon hours- or really days.  But
column4: you aren't going to see all of this place in a few hours
column5: so don't even try.  Just check out the parts that interest you(and trust me
column6: there will be at least one).
